net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.view

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Canvas
        • net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.view.Screen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Viewable

    public class Screen
extends java.awt.Canvas
implements Viewable, java.lang.Runnable
    A Viewable that consists of a JFrame and a Canvas, intended for full screen games.
    Since:
    May 4, 2016, 10:52:29 AM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • enableKeyboard

        public void enableKeyboard()
        Enables the use of the Keyboard by the StateManager and its respective States. It is disabled by default.

      • enableMouse

        public void enableMouse()
        Enables the use of the Mouse by the StateManager and its respective States. It is disabled by default.

      • enableGamepads

        public void enableGamepads()
        Enables the use of Gamepads by the StateManager and its respective States. They are disabled by default.

      • enableSmoothShapes

        public void enableSmoothShapes()
        Enables the anti-aliasing of graphical primitives. This is disabled by default.

      • enableSmoothText

        public void enableSmoothText()
        Enables the anti-aliasing of text. This is disabled by default.

      • enableFrameRateLock

        public void enableFrameRateLock()
        Sets the frame rate to be locked to the update rate. Frame rates are unlocked by default.
